errors.duplicateSlot: This appointment time has been taken by another user. Please select another time.
errors.timeRequired: Start and end time are required.
errors.customerDistanceExceeded: Your distance to the store is too far. Maximum distance: 1 km.
errors.freebarberDistanceExceeded: Your distance to the free barber is too far. Maximum distance: 1 km.
errors.freebarberStoreDistanceExceeded: The distance between the free barber and the store is too far. Maximum distance: 1 km.
errors.storeFreebarberDistanceExceeded: The distance between the store and the free barber is too far. Maximum distance: 1 km.
errors.customerHasActiveAppointment: You already have an active appointment. You need to complete or cancel your current appointment to make a new one.
errors.freebarberHasActiveAppointment: The free barber already has an active appointment.
errors.storeHasActiveCall: The store already has an active call.
errors.storeClosed: The store is closed at these hours.
errors.storeNotOpen: The store is not open at these hours.
errors.storeNoWorkingHours: The store has not defined working hours for this day (closed).
errors.storeHasActiveAppointments: This store has active or pending appointments. You must be available first.
errors.appointmentSlotOverlap: The selected time slot overlaps with another appointment.
errors.appointmentSlotTaken: This appointment time has been taken before.
errors.freebarberNotAvailable: The free barber is not available right now.
errors.freebarberNotAllowedForStoreAppointment: Free barber cannot be selected for store appointments.
errors.freebarberUpdateUnauthorized: You do not have permission to update this free barber.
errors.freebarberPanelAlreadyExists: You already have a free barber panel. Each user can only have one panel.
errors.appointmentTimeNotPassed: Appointment cannot be completed before its time.
errors.appointmentPastDate: Cannot make appointments for past dates.
errors.appointmentPastTime: Cannot make appointments for past times.
errors.appointmentDateCannotBePast: Appointment date cannot be in the past.
errors.startTimeGreaterThanEndTime: Start time cannot be greater than or equal to end time.
errors.serviceOfferingRequired: At least one service must be selected.
errors.serviceOfferingOwnerMismatch: Selected services do not belong to this user.
errors.chatOnlyForActiveAppointments: Chat is only allowed for Pending/Approved appointments.
errors.unauthorizedOperation: You do not have permission for this operation.
errors.notAParticipant: You are not a participant in this appointment.
errors.manuelBarberHasActiveAppointments: This barber has pending or active appointment processes.
errors.imageOwnerIdRequired: Image owner ID cannot be empty.
errors.customerNumberCreationFailed: Customer number could not be created. Please try again.
errors.appointmentMustBeCompletedForFavorite: Your appointment must be completed to favorite from the appointment page.
errors.appointmentCannotAddStore: Store cannot be added to this appointment.
errors.freebarberApprovalStepNotAvailable: This appointment does not have a free barber approval step. Store selection is pending.
errors.cannotRejectAfterApproval: Appointment approved, you can no longer reject.
errors.cannotRejectAfterCancellation: Appointment cancelled, you can no longer reject.
errors.cannotRejectAfterCompletion: Appointment completed, you can no longer reject.
errors.customerDecisionNotAllowed: Customer decision cannot be given for this appointment.
errors.cannotDeletePendingOrApproved: Appointments in Pending or Approved status cannot be deleted.
errors.noAppointmentsDeleted: No appointments could be deleted. {{count}} appointments are in Pending or Approved status.
errors.ratingAlreadyExists: You have already rated this target for this appointment. Rating cannot be updated.
errors.notificationsNotFoundForDelete: Notification to delete not found. All notifications belong to appointments in Pending or Approved status.
errors.fcmTokenRegistrationFailed: FCM token could not be registered.
errors.fcmTokenUnregistrationFailed: FCM token could not be unregistered.
